
# Load in the clean datafiles  
```{r}
expr_clean <- read_tsv("data/02_expr_clean.tsv")
target_clean <- read_tsv("data/02_target_clean.tsv")
```

# Augmenting the dataframe reflecting the gene expression levels
```{r}
#| label: add upgerulated/downregulated column 
expr_clean |> 
  mutate(Regulation = case_when("Expr Log Ration (before)" < "Expr Log Ration (after)" ~ "Upregulated",
                                "Expr Log Ration (before)" > "Expr Log Ration (after)" ~ "Downregulated"))

```

# Augmenting the dataframe reflecting the target molecules
```{r}
target_clean |> 
  mutate(n_before = "Target molecule_before_")

```
